tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Lectures are very informative and the textbook material is covered in depth. His teaching style is very much "out of the book," so don\'t expect too many classroom activities that truly test whether you understand the material or not.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Doc Epps, despite being a hotshot young professor, seems to actually care about teaching thermo. He puts a lot of time into his lectures and is helpful outside of class. The tests are harder than those that Buttrey gave in thermo 1 but make sure you remember any equation that Epps boxed in class. Epps receives a medium recommendation from me.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Epps will make you feel like an idiot if you ask questions in class, and you can tell he really doesn\'t want to be there. But the class overall is not too bad, tests are fairly reasonable for CHEG.
